title: USGS WR18 Hydrology Data Package
description: This dataset contains daily streamflow data and associated hydrologic features for USGS Water Resource Region 18 (WR18) by processing hourly streamflow data from the National Water Model v3.0  to daily for all associated COMID ids labelled StreamRiver for Region 18.

region.name: Water Resource Region 18
region.note: Vector Processing Unit 18 included 1606 and 1712, but this are not part of HUC-2 region 18 and were excluded.

geometry_cleaning: Converted to 2D LineString (stripped Z/M if present)

streamflow.source_dataset: NOAA National Water Model v3.0 Retrospective (1979â€“2023)
streamflow.subset_method: Match COMID from Region 18 Flowline metadata with feature_id in the National Water Model v3.0 output.
streamflow.processing: Resampled to daily mean using xarray

author: Eli Holmes, NOAA Fisheries, eli.holmes@noaa.gov
